remark.ch: 初級課程，限修過初級越南語且成績及格者選修。

goal.en: - Familiar with Vietnamese pronunciation, can quickly read the pronunciation of words. - Application of Vietnamese in tourism: buying air tickets, customs clearance, hotel accommodation, rides, buying tickets, eating, visiting scenic spots, etc. - Recognize various Vietnamese vocabulary words and use them to make sentences. - Be able to apply the basic grammar of Vietnamese and apply it to communication in tourism.
goal.ch: -熟悉越南語發音、能快速看字讀音。 -應用越南語在觀光旅遊：買機票、通關、飯店住宿、搭車、買門票、飲食、參觀景點等。 -認識越南語之多種詞彙與使用詞彙造句。 -能應用越南語的基礎語法並進行簡易的溝通。

content.en:
- Introduce the method of Vietnamese pinyin (recognition of letters, tones, finals, and pinyin rules).
- Increase Vietnamese vocabulary and basic grammar.
- Introduce everyday conversations for sightseeing (buying air tickets, customs clearance, hotel accommodation, rides, buying tickets, eating, visiting attractions, etc.).
- Learn about Vietnam, such as famous tourist attractions, life culture, travel tips, social economy, etc.
content.ch:
- 介紹越南語拼音方法(認識字母、聲調、各韻母和拼音規則).- 增加越南語詞彙和基礎的語法。
- 介紹觀光的常用會話(買機票、通關、飯店住宿、搭車、買門票、飲食、參觀景點等)。
- 認識越南國家如各出名旅遊景點、生活文化、旅遊應住意事項、社會經濟等。

grading.en: *30％ of usual grades (attendance, class interaction, class oral assignments) *30％ in the mid-term (reading content related to tourism in Vietnamese) *40％ at the end of the term (conversations or introductory travel essays in simulated tours in Vietnamese)
grading.ch: *平時成績30％ (出席、課堂互動、課堂口頭作業) *期中30％ (朗讀越南語有關旅遊之內容) *期末40 (使用越南語模擬旅遊中的對話或介紹旅遊短文)
